agentData.mission: Diagnose and resolve the repeated CodeExecution failure pattern ('container lost after testing 0/50 files') by running a minimal preflight smoke script (e.g., the created `preflight_smoke.py` / diagnostics scripts) and writing a concrete failure report to `runtime/_build/reports/execution_health.json` plus `runtime/_build/logs/execution_health.log` with reproduction steps and environment details.
